aka: 關於傑納瑟斯與珍女士的民謠
awards:
第61届柏林国际电影节(2011)
　　泰迪熊奖 最佳纪录片 玛丽·洛西尔
this_title: THE BALLAD OF GENESIS AND LADY JAYE
trans_title: 关于杰纳瑟斯与珍女士的民谣
關於傑納瑟斯與珍女士的民謠
introduction: An intimate, affecting portrait of the life and work of ground-breaking performance artist and music pioneer Genesis Breyer P-Orridge (Throbbing Gristle, Psychic TV) and his other half and collaborator, Lady Jaye, centered around the daring sexual transformations the pair underwent for their “Pandrogyne” project
chinese_title: 关于杰纳瑟斯与珍女士的民谣
foreign_title: THE BALLAD OF GENESIS AND LADY JAYE
